DDescription.description: The pipelet checks the user's permission against the given authorization object. If the user doesn't have the permission at the given authorization object the pipelet returns PIPELET_ERROR The UserPermission is evaluated with the following precedence: 1. Permission from pipeline dictionary, if there is no 2. PermissionID from pipeline dictionary, if there is no 3. DefaultPermissionID from config parameters, if there is no If no permissionID is found and exception is thrown.
The current user to check the permission of. This parameter is required.
The object to check the permission against. Can be an Organization or a Domain (channel/repository domain). This parameter is required.
